general: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Stick to solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all headings to maintain the industrial/professional look.
Ensure high contrast for all text. Yellow text on white is FORBIDDEN.
Use the 'Hard Shadow' (shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)]) for primary buttons to give a tactile feel.
All interactive elements must have a hover state.
Mobile-first: Design for the phone screen first, then expand for desktop.
accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1.
Use semantic HTML (nav, main, section, article).
All images must have alt text.
testing: All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.

instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the 'Bee' theme strictly. Use the provided color palette. Implement the 'Hard Shadow' button style for primary actions. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and demo content. Ensure the public booking page is mobile-optimized and extremely simple to use.
